title: Connie Britton And Martina McBride: 'This One's For The Girls' (R)
description: AMA heads to Nashville! NPR's Ann Powers gives us the inside scoop on Music City, musician Martina McBride talks about her writing process, and actor Connie Britton plays a game about famous TV moms.
